Posts.Content: Mar 12, 2012 01:00PM lm4060 wrote: I had a stereotactic biopsy on Thursday for microcalcifications . My birad was 4.  After the dr finished, I asked him how many there was and he replied there was too many to count and that they were linear. He said they would call me tomorrow (Tuesday) with the  results.....nervous but waiting. I send hugs and prayers to those with B/C and those waiting for results.
Posts.Title: So who is waiting for test results/ or having test Tenmom Kimberly5307
